In this session we are fitting species distribution models to the data of koalas (*Phascolarctos cinereus*) in the South-East Queensland (SEQ) region under current climatic conditions, which we will predict into future climatic conditions.

![Koala (*Phascolarctos cinereus*)](koala_pic.png){fig-align="center"}

::: {layout-ncol=2}
![Current climatic suitability of koalas in SEQ](outputs/GLM_outputs/predicted_current.png)

![Projected change of climatic suitability for koalas in SEQ](outputs/GLM_outputs/future370-current.png)
:::
